select pr.`id` as id, pr.`create_time` as trade_time, pr.`trade_no` as trade_no, pr.`bill_plan` as bill_plan, c.`corp_name` as corp_name, c.`short_name` as short_name, cu.`username` as username, p.`name` as product_name, rt.`name` as recharge_type, pr.`amount` as amount, pr.`balance` as balance, m.`name` as manager_name, pr.`contract_no` as contract_no, pr.`remark` as remark from `recharge` pr left join `client` c on pr.`client_id` = c.`id` left join `client_user` cu on c.`primary_user_id` = cu.`id` left join `product` p on pr.`product_id` = p.`id` left join `user` m on pr.`manager_id` = m.`id` left join `dict_recharge_type` rt on pr.`recharge_type` = rt.`id`
and pr.`create_time` >= #{startTime} and pr.`create_time` < #{endTime}

select pr.`create_time` as trade_time, pr.`trade_no` as trade_no, pr.`start_date` as start_date, pr.`end_date` as end_date, pr.`unit_amt` as unit_amt, pr.`bill_plan` as bill_plan, c.`corp_name` as corp_name, c.`short_name` as short_name, c.`username` as username, p.`name` as product_name, drt.`name` as recharge_type, pr.`amount` as amount, pr.`balance` as balance, m.`name` as manager_name, pr.`contract_no` as contract_no, pr.`remark` as remark from `recharge` pr left join `client` c on pr.`client_id` = c.`id` left join `user` m on pr.`manager_id` = m.`id` left join `product` p on pr.`product_id` = p.`id` left join `dict_recharge_type` drt on pr.`recharge_type` = drt.`id`
(c.`corp_name` like '%${keyword}%' or c.`short_name` like '%${keyword}%' or pr.`trade_no` like '%${keyword}%' or pr.`contract_no` like '%${keyword}%')
and pr.`product_id` = #{productId} and pr.`manager_id` = #{managerId} and pr.`recharge_type` = #{rechargeType} and pr.`create_time` >= #{fromDate} and pr.`create_time` < #{toDate}
order by pr.`create_time` desc

select pr.`create_time` as trade_time, pr.`trade_no` as trade_no, p.`name` as product_name, drt.`name` as recharge_type, pr.`bill_plan` as bill_plan, pr.`amount` as amount, pr.`balance` as balance, m.`name` as manager_name, pr.`contract_no` as contract_no from `recharge` pr left join `product` p on pr.`product_id` = p.`id` left join `user` m on pr.`manager_id` = m.`id` left join `dict_recharge_type` drt on pr.`recharge_type` = drt.`id` where pr.`client_id` = #{clientId} and pr.`product_id` = #{productId} and pr.`create_time` >= #{startTime} and pr.`create_time` < #{endTime}
